00011 // constant.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "texture.h"
00014 #include "paramset.h"
00015 // ConstantTexture Method Definitions
00016 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Texture<float> * CreateFloatTexture(const Transform &tex2world,
00017                 const TextureParams &tp) {
00018         return new ConstantTexture<float>(tp.FindFloat("value", 1.f));
00019 }
00020 
00021 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Texture<Spectrum> * CreateSpectrumTexture(const Transform &tex2world,
00022                 const TextureParams &tp) {
00023         return new ConstantTexture<Spectrum>(tp.FindSpectrum("value", Spectrum(1.f)));
00024 }
